attributes.action: Remove all US military assets from UK soil and waters, and close their bases.
attributes.additional_details:
The US is currently an existential threat to the UK and our allies.

We saw them threaten, then illegally invade Venezuela. 

We've seen them threaten Greenland, Denmark, Canada, and other sovereign States. 

We cannot allow them to base personnel, weapons, aircraft, vehicles or vessels, on our soil or in our waters, while they threaten Nato members.

We should also withdraw all support for US refuelling, intelligence gathering, and offensive or defensive operations.

We do not appease Fascism.
attributes.background:
We cannot allow the US to base military assets on our soil while they threaten to invade our allies. These bases must be closed, and all assets removed or seized. 

Additionally, we should no longer provide any form of support for intelligence gathering, refuelling, or any military action.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/756133
